CheckTitle: Ensure alert is configured for cloud firewall policy changes
Description: Ensures that an alert is configured in SLS to monitor and notify on Cloud Firewall policy changes.
Risk: Unauthorized firewall policy changes can expose resources to network attacks or unauthorized access.

Recommendation.Text: Create and enable an alert in SLS to monitor cloud firewall policy changes from ActionTrail logs.

Notes: This check looks for enabled alerts that monitor cloud firewall policy changes.
